comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: More of Hoppé's work here: www.eohoppe.com/galleries.html I've seen his photographs of Australia, and they are of outstanding quality, and some of the subject matter is rare for the era.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Queer Vintage, and we'd love to have this added to the group! thanks! featured@queering here: queering.tumblr.com/post/151724252/ruth-st-denis-and-ted-... thank you new york public library,you're famous on tumblr=]
